data.text: @eddireader Dundee rep is producing great work the recent slight up date of the "The Cheviot, Stag and Black, Black Oil" was brilliant, both entertaining and educational. Worst of all I saw the original 7:84 version ouch just a few years ago!
@eddireader Don't forget Irvine/Ayr's very own @BorderlineCo. They did so much for my theatre experience in Irvine when I was pretending to be growing up.
